msg.msgText: At least one MessagingPolicy of DestinationType "Topic" must be specified if a MessagingPolicy of DestinationType "Subscription" is specified.

msgExplanation.p: One MessagingPolicy of DestinationType 'Topic' is needed.

msgUserResponse.p: Specify a MessagingPolicy with DestinationType 'Topic' also in MessagingPolicies configuration item and run command again.
